NIAB Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 14 Technical Assistant, Young Professional and Other Posts
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 20, 2025, 10:29 IST
 National Institute of Animal Biotechnology
 14 Jobs |  Posted On : 20-Aug-2025 |  Telangana |  Salary : 20,000 to 56,000




FOLLOW

The National Institute of Animal Biotechnology (NIAB) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the 14 vacancies for Technical Assistant, Young Professional, and Project Research Scientist Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.Pharm, B.Sc, M.Pharm, M.Sc, MVSc, M.Phil/ Ph.D can grab this chance and apply for the NIAB Recruitment 2025. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online through the website on or before the last date of application. For more details, visit the official website.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Telangana.

NIAB Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Technical Assistant	06	B.Pharm, BVSc, B.Sc
Young Professional	04	M.Pharm, MVSc, M.Sc
Project Research Scientist	04	Ph.D

Age Limit for the NIAB Recruitment 2025 

The Minimum Age Limit: 21 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 50 years.

Selection Process for the NIAB Recruitment 2025 

Interview

Salary Structure for the NIAB Recruitment 2025 

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 20,000 /- per month
The Maximum Salary: Rs. 56,000 /- per month.

Application fee for the NIAB Recruitment 2025 

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the NIAB Recruitment 2025 
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the Technical Assistant jobs 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Click on the Apply Online link.
Log in with your email and password.
Fill out the given details carefully.
Pay the application fee (if applicable).
Submit the application form and capture the application number for further reference.

Important Dates

Starting Date of Application	13-08-2025
Last Date of Application	23-08-2025

 

Apply Online	Click Here
Official Notification	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
